key_components: Workflow trigger on push and pull_request events
Environment variable for API key secret

patterns_discovered.description: Tests are executed across multiple Python versions (3.10, 3.11) to ensure compatibility
Coverage report upload only runs for Python 3.11 to avoid duplicate uploads
ANTHROPIC_API_KEY injected as environment variable from GitHub secrets
CI fails if coverage falls below 70% threshold
pip cache utilized to speed up dependency installation

gotchas_discovered.description: Workflow references 'ai-content-agents/requirements.txt' and 'ai-content-agents/tests/' - workflow assumes specific project structure
gotchas_discovered.impact: May fail if directory structure changes without updating workflow

gotchas_discovered.description: Codecov upload has 'fail_ci_if_error: false' - upload failures won't block CI
gotchas_discovered.impact: Coverage reports may not be tracked without obvious failure indication

gotchas_discovered.description: Only triggers on main, master, and develop branches - feature branches won't run CI
gotchas_discovered.impact: May miss issues in feature branches unless explicitly included

gotchas_discovered.description: Only runs on ubuntu-latest - no Windows or macOS testing
gotchas_discovered.impact: Platform-specific issues may not be caught

approach_outcome.description: GitHub Actions CI workflow successfully created with comprehensive testing and coverage tracking
approach_outcome.implementation_notes: Workflow includes matrix testing across Python versions, dependency caching, pytest execution with coverage reporting, and Codecov integration

recommendations.recommendation: Consider making directory paths configurable or using environment variables to reduce hardcoding of project structure
Enable fail_ci_if_error: true for codecov upload to ensure coverage tracking failures don't go unnoticed
Review branch trigger configuration - consider allowing pull_request from all branches while keeping push restricted to main release branches
Consider adding macOS and Windows to matrix strategy if project supports multiple platforms
Document the 70% coverage threshold and considerations for modifying it in future updates
